questions.question_text: If an HR Document must be manually generated for an HR Case, who is able to generate the document from the Case record?

choices.D: Only the Manager of the assignment group can generate the Document
choices.A: Only an HR Admin can generate Documents from a Case
choices.B: Any HR professional can generate the Document, even if they are not assigned to the Case
choices.C: Only the assigned to person can manually generate Documents from a Case

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Its C, assigned to person can manually generate the document

Selected Answer: C
Assigned to person can manually generate the Document.

Selected Answer: C
Assigned To person
The answer is C : Assigned Person

Selected Answer: B
This dashboard is restricted to the following roles: sn_hr_le.activity_reader, sn_hr_le.case_reader

Selected Answer: B
MINIMUM role is asked
B is correct, check roles in your instance after downloading HR Lifecycle Event

Selected Answer: B
B correct as it is asking minimum role req

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-employee-service-management/page/product/human-resources/reference/components-installed-with-enterprise-onboarding-and-transitions.html
This suggests that answer is C: LE Admin

comments.content: Check your PDI, Access this Dashboard, then select "Share". You will see message that indicates sn_hr_le.case_reader is a role that can access. ANSWER is B

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Correct Answer should be "LE Admin"

questions.question_text: What role is required at a minimum, to access the Lifecycle Events Cases View Dashboard?

choices.C: HR Case Workers. Employees, users in other groups
choices.D: Only users with the Manager role
choices.B: Only users with an HR role
choices.A: Only users with a Client Role

questions.question_text: Using the Lifecycle Event Enterprise application, tasks may only be assigned to... (Choose the most appropriate answer.)
What does ServiceNow now call the HR application?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is the Correct Answer

questions.question_text: What identifies data from HRSD to push to a third-party HR application?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
HR Implementation ebook page 176: with an outbound integration, data is pushed from the HR tables or HR service in HRSD to the third-party HR management system. The HR outbound schema mappings map the data from the source tables to the fields in the target system.
